story.title: From Code Competitions to Enterprise Solutions
paragraphs: My journey started with competitive programming, where I became a 3-time national finalist in India's largest coding competition, ranking among the top 300 out of 250,000+ developers.

Over 8+ years, I've evolved from writing algorithms to architecting enterprise solutions that serve Fortune 500 companies. I've led technical teams, built products from inception to acquisition, and created systems that directly drive business revenue.
Today, I specialize in microservices architecture, AI integration, and blockchain solutions, helping companies scale their technology while building high-performing remote teams.
story.highlight:
Career Highlights:
  • As a senior member of Gartner's Innovation Tools team, developed software products, defined best practices for efficient development, and managed and contributed to a shared code library to promote code reuse across products.
  • Designed, architected and lead the development of microservice based application interacting with deep learning models (AI) on multiple fronts.
  • Consulting Developer at KPIT centre of excellence
  • Secured a position in top 300 coders of India in Code Gladiators 2017,2018 and 2019, a national level competitive coding contest out of 2.5 lakhs+ competitors.
  • Contributed in development of java productivity accelerator framework, it is intended to generate standard, scalable and maintainable code in an hour, which otherwise would take over a month. (2016-2018)
  • Acquired certificate for Design and analysis of algorithm from Microsoft Research Bangalore.

professional.label: Professional Work
professional.description: Enterprise solutions that drive business results

cybersecurity-platform.title: Enterprise Cybersecurity Benchmarking Platform (CSBVB)
cybersecurity-platform.description: Single-handedly built backend serving 720+ CISOs across Fortune 500 companies, integrating ChatGPT for AI insights and automated quarterly reporting across 16 research-backed metrics.
highlights: Built complete backend infrastructure serving Fortune 500 CISOs
Integrated OpenAI ChatGPT for automated security insights and recommendations
Became primary driver for $5m+ enterprise contract renewals
Dashboard delegation feature extended reach to 2,500+ users
Automated 500+ quarterly reports, replacing manual processes
cybersecurity-platform.impact: 15+ clients explicitly cited platform as primary reason for Gartner license renewal
cybersecurity-platform.architecture: Microservices with Spring Boot backend, React frontend, PostgreSQL + Elasticsearch for data, AWS hosting

ai-document-processing.title: AI-Powered Document Processing System
ai-document-processing.description: Orchestrated 11 ML models (Python/Julia) via Kafka to process bills, receipts, and letters of credit with 99% accuracy, processing 1,000+ documents nightly. Success led to formation of Curl HG.
highlights: Orchestrated 11 different ML models in production pipeline
Achieved 99% accuracy in document classification and extraction
Built innovative offline PWA for low-bandwidth ship environments
Processed 1,000+ documents nightly without manual intervention
Success directly led to spin-off company Curl HG formation
ai-document-processing.impact: Platform success led to formation of dedicated company Curl HG for this product line
ai-document-processing.architecture: Microservices orchestration layer with Kafka message broker, 11 ML models in different languages, edge computing deployment
challenges: Orchestrating models built in different languages (Python, Julia)
Building offline-capable edge solution for ships

code-generation-framework.title: Java Productivity Accelerator Framework
code-generation-framework.description: Architected framework with 22 standardized templates that automates 75% of application development, enabling migration of 150+ legacy LotusScript applications across 15+ teams.
highlights: Created 22 standardized templates covering common use cases
Automated 75% of standard application development workflows
Enabled migration of 150+ legacy LotusScript applications
Adopted by 15+ development teams across organizations
Built-in OWASP security compliance and best practices
code-generation-framework.impact: Transformed development process across multiple organizations, reducing development time significantly
code-generation-framework.architecture: Template-based code generation with Maven integration, supports Spring Boot, Angular, Node.js outputs
challenges: Ensuring generated code meets enterprise security standards
Building templates flexible enough for different use cases

engineering-dashboard.title: Engineering Intelligence Dashboard
engineering-dashboard.description: Built automated dashboard integrating JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Workday APIs, reducing leadership reporting from 1.5 hours to 15 minutes (90% time savings) across 24 projects.
highlights: Integrated 4 major enterprise tools (JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket, Workday)
Reduced weekly leadership meetings by 90% (1.5 hours to 15 minutes)
Automated release email notifications with approval workflows
Enabled real-time visibility into 24 projects across 15+ teams
Built impact analysis for feature releases and business metrics
engineering-dashboard.impact: Became integral part of team workflows for all hands meetings and release planning

enterprise-maven-libraries.title: Enterprise Maven Libraries
enterprise-maven-libraries.description: Architected and maintained enterprise-wide Maven libraries serving 24 applications, managing dependency versions with Snyk security compliance and common functionalities including Gartner API integrations.
highlights: Created standardized foundation for all 24 enterprise applications
Managed dependency versions and security compliance using Snyk
Built common functionalities including Gartner API integrations
Eliminated code duplication across applications through reusable components
Adopted by 45+ developers across 15+ teams
Established standardized practices reducing security vulnerabilities
enterprise-maven-libraries.impact: Became the foundation layer for all enterprise development, ensuring consistent security and reducing development time
enterprise-maven-libraries.architecture: Centralized Maven repository with versioned artifacts, automated security scanning, and common utility libraries
challenges: Maintaining security compliance across all libraries

blockchain-practice.title: Enterprise Blockchain Practice
blockchain-practice.description: Built and led blockchain practice from 0 to 12 team members, architecting Hyperledger Fabric solutions for asset tokenization and self-sovereign identity.
highlights: Built blockchain practice from inception, growing team to 12 members
Architected asset tokenization platform for real-world assets
Implemented self-sovereign identity using DIDs and Verifiable Credentials
Led research on consensus mechanisms and enterprise adoption
Contributed to government blockchain initiative proposals
blockchain-practice.impact: Established company's Web3 capabilities and positioned for future blockchain opportunities

test-automation-framework.title: AI-Powered Test Automation Framework
test-automation-framework.description: Pioneered GenAI-powered testing using Selenium, Appium, and JUnit with automatic test case generation, achieving 85% coverage across 9 applications.
highlights: Pioneered AI-powered test case generation and updates
Deployed across 9 enterprise applications
Achieved 85% test coverage consistently
Reduced UI test maintenance effort by 67%
Adopted by 15-20 developers across teams
